body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is Edward Walker and I'm a customer service representative at XYZ Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Megan Alexander.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Megan. How can I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven eight six - five five five - four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Megan. And could you also provide me with your email address so we can follow up with you on this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is m.alexander@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Megan. I will make sure to pass this along to the relevant team. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I'm just feeling sad about the inventory issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Megan. We'll do our best to resolve the inventory problem for you. Thank you for reaching out and sharing your concerns with us. Your feedback is valuable. Have a great day!
